message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay $100 for it. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, I understand your offer, but I can't go lower than $105. It's a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go above $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
